projects.title: Watched
projects.description: Watched is a fullstack application to keep track and manage your favorite shows. It is built with a React and Redux frontend and a rails API backend.

projects.title: Devit
projects.description: Devit is a link aggregator site, similar to Reddit or Hacker News, where a user can submit a link and content to a community, as well as comment on and vote on those submissions.

projects.title: Paper
projects.description: RESTful Sinatra web application to create Notebooks that contain: notes, bookmarks and tasks.

projects.title: DevTo CLI Gem
projects.description: Application that provides a Command Line Interface (CLI) to an external data source (dev.to). The CLI is composed of an Object Oriented Ruby application.

projects.title: This website: prbsas
projects.description: This website was made with React and Next.js. It uses styled-components with theming. Click anywhere on the page and the theme changes. Deployed with Now.

projects.title: Hex Color Generator
projects.description: Change background color by clicking inside the circle or pressing the spacebar. The hex color is printed below. This project was built with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Select and Color
projects.description: Paste some text and select it to see it appear full of color. This project uses the skeleton CSS responsive boilerplate, vanilla JavaScript and the selecting.js and chroma.js libraries.

projects.title: Guitar Tuner
projects.description: Click inside the circles or press the numbers shown and listen. This project was built with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Flexbox Cards
projects.description: A series of cards with descriptions and pictures of famous architects. Responsive Layout made with Flexbox.

projects.title: Iso Gallery
projects.description: Responsive gallery with a Masonry Layout, built with Isotope.js.

projects.title: JavaScript Clock
projects.description: Simple digital clock made with vanilla JS.

projects.title: Random Quote Machine
projects.description: Random programming quotes delivered by the Storm Consultancy's API. Get a quote on click and tweet it if it has less than 140 characters. This project was made with vanilla JavaScript and deployed with Surge.

projects.title: 9 Random
projects.description: Get 9 random images from https://unsplash.it every time you refresh the page or press the refresh button. Built with vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Giphy 6
projects.description: Get 6 gifs trending with the progamming tag. Made with the Giphy API, vanilla JavaScript and deployed with Surge.

projects.title: LightBox Image Gallery
projects.description: Simple image gallery built with the lightgallery.js library.

projects.title: Youtube React App
projects.description: React App to search videos from the Youtube API. Built with create-react-app. (Working on it to make it responsive)

projects.title: Spotify React App
projects.description: React App to search for artists with the Spotify API. It displays and allows to play the first 10 songs. Built with create-react-app. (Working on it to make it responsive)

projects.title: Previous website
projects.description: This site was made with HTML, CSS, vanilla JS and the fullpage.js library.
